
######################################
# AUTOGENERATED on 2025-03-17 22:02:38.946288                #
######################################


#growth #leader_trait_army_veteran_2 #common
oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_growth_leader_trait_army_veteran_2_add_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = { NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_army_veteran_2 } }
	}
	allow = {
		custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_official_leader_trait_army_veteran_2
		oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_resources_cost_common = yes
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_points_cost_common = yes
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_picks = yes
			#oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_leader_has_required_subclass = { CLASS = official SUBCLASS = None }
		}
		
	}
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_show_trait_total_cost_common
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { TRAIT_NAME = leader_trait_army_veteran }
			add_trait_no_notify = leader_trait_army_veteran_2
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_resources_cost_common = yes
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_points_cost_common = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_pick = yes
			}
		}
	}
}
oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_growth_leader_trait_army_veteran_2_remove_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = { has_trait = leader_trait_army_veteran_2 }
	}
	allow = { always = yes }
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_remove_official_leader_trait_army_veteran_2
		hidden_effect = {
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
				remove_trait = leader_trait_army_veteran_2
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_points_cost_common = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_pick = yes
			}
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_resources_cost_common = yes
		}
	}
}


#growth #leader_trait_politician_2 #common
oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_growth_leader_trait_politician_2_add_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = { NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_politician_2 } }
	}
	allow = {
		custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_official_leader_trait_politician_2
		oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_resources_cost_common = yes
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_points_cost_common = yes
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_picks = yes
			#oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_leader_has_required_subclass = { CLASS = official SUBCLASS = None }
		}
		
	}
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_show_trait_total_cost_common
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { TRAIT_NAME = leader_trait_politician }
			add_trait_no_notify = leader_trait_politician_2
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_resources_cost_common = yes
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_points_cost_common = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_pick = yes
			}
		}
	}
}
oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_growth_leader_trait_politician_2_remove_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = { has_trait = leader_trait_politician_2 }
	}
	allow = { always = yes }
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_remove_official_leader_trait_politician_2
		hidden_effect = {
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
				remove_trait = leader_trait_politician_2
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_points_cost_common = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_pick = yes
			}
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_resources_cost_common = yes
		}
	}
}


#growth #leader_trait_principled_2 #common
oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_growth_leader_trait_principled_2_add_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = { NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_principled_2 } }
	}
	allow = {
		custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_official_leader_trait_principled_2
		oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_resources_cost_common = yes
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_points_cost_common = yes
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_picks = yes
			#oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_leader_has_required_subclass = { CLASS = official SUBCLASS = None }
		}
		
	}
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_show_trait_total_cost_common
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { TRAIT_NAME = leader_trait_principled }
			add_trait_no_notify = leader_trait_principled_2
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_resources_cost_common = yes
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_points_cost_common = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_pick = yes
			}
		}
	}
}
oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_growth_leader_trait_principled_2_remove_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = { has_trait = leader_trait_principled_2 }
	}
	allow = { always = yes }
	effect = {

#growth #trait_ruler_champion_of_the_people_2 #common
oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_growth_trait_ruler_champion_of_the_people_2_add_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = { NOT = { has_trait = trait_ruler_champion_of_the_people_2 } }
	}
	allow = {
		custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_official_trait_ruler_champion_of_the_people_2
		oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_resources_cost_common = yes
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_points_cost_common = yes
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_picks = yes
			#oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_leader_has_required_subclass = { CLASS = official SUBCLASS = None }
		}
		
	}
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_show_trait_total_cost_common
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { TRAIT_NAME = trait_ruler_champion_of_the_people }
			add_trait_no_notify = trait_ruler_champion_of_the_people_2
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_resources_cost_common = yes
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_points_cost_common = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_pick = yes
			}
		}
	}
}
oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_growth_trait_ruler_champion_of_the_people_2_remove_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = { has_trait = trait_ruler_champion_of_the_people_2 }
	}
	allow = { always = yes }
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_remove_official_trait_ruler_champion_of_the_people_2
		hidden_effect = {
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
				remove_trait = trait_ruler_champion_of_the_people_2
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_points_cost_common = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_pick = yes
			}
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_resources_cost_common = yes
		}
	}

		}

				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_pick = yes
			}
		}
	}

	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = { NOT = { has_trait = trait_ruler_feedback_loop_2 } }
	}
	allow = {

		oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_resources_cost_common = yes

			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_points_cost_common = yes
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_picks = yes
			#oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_leader_has_required_subclass = { CLASS = official SUBCLASS = None }
		}
		
	}
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_show_trait_total_cost_common
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { TRAIT_NAME = trait_ruler_feedback_loop }
			add_trait_no_notify = trait_ruler_feedback_loop_2
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_resources_cost_common = yes
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_points_cost_common = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_pick = yes
			}
		}
	}
}

oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_growth_trait_ruler_fertility_preacher_2_add_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = { NOT = { has_trait = trait_ruler_fertility_preacher_2 } }
	}
	allow = {
		custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_official_trait_ruler_fertility_preacher_2
		oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_resources_cost_common = yes
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_points_cost_common = yes
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_picks = yes
			#oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_leader_has_required_subclass = { CLASS = official SUBCLASS = None }
		}
		
	}
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_show_trait_total_cost_common
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { TRAIT_NAME = trait_ruler_fertility_preacher }
			add_trait_no_notify = trait_ruler_fertility_preacher_2
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_resources_cost_common = yes
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_points_cost_common = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_pick = yes
			}
		}
	}
}
oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_growth_trait_ruler_fertility_preacher_2_remove_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = { has_trait = trait_ruler_fertility_preacher_2 }
	}
	allow = { always = yes }
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_remove_official_trait_ruler_fertility_preacher_2
		hidden_effect = {
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
				remove_trait = trait_ruler_fertility_preacher_2
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_points_cost_common = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_pick = yes
			}
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_resources_cost_common = yes
		}
	}
}


#growth #trait_ruler_frontier_spirit #common
oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_growth_trait_ruler_frontier_spirit_add_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = { NOT = { has_trait = trait_ruler_frontier_spirit } }
	}
	allow = {
		custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_official_trait_ruler_frontier_spirit
		oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_resources_cost_common = yes
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_points_cost_common = yes
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_picks = yes
			#oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_leader_has_required_subclass = { CLASS = official SUBCLASS = None }
		}
		
	}
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_show_trait_total_cost_common
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { TRAIT_NAME = trait_ruler_frontier_spirit }
			add_trait_no_notify = trait_ruler_frontier_spirit
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_resources_cost_common = yes
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_points_cost_common = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_pick = yes
			}
		}
	}
}
oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_growth_trait_ruler_frontier_spirit_remove_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = { has_trait = trait_ruler_frontier_spirit }
	}
	allow = { always = yes }
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_remove_official_trait_ruler_frontier_spirit
		hidden_effect = {
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
				remove_trait = trait_ruler_frontier_spirit
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_points_cost_common = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_pick = yes
			}
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_resources_cost_common = yes
		}
	}
}


#growth #trait_ruler_industrialist_2 #common
oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_growth_trait_ruler_industrialist_2_add_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = { NOT = { has_trait = trait_ruler_industrialist_2 } }
	}
	allow = {
		custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_official_trait_ruler_industrialist_2
		oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_resources_cost_common = yes
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_points_cost_common = yes
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_picks = yes
			#oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_leader_has_required_subclass = { CLASS = official SUBCLASS = None }
		}
		
	}
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_show_trait_total_cost_common
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { TRAIT_NAME = trait_ruler_industrialist }
			add_trait_no_notify = trait_ruler_industrialist_2
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_resources_cost_common = yes
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_points_cost_common = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_pick = yes
			}
		}
	}
}

	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = { has_trait = trait_ruler_industrialist_2 }
	}
	allow = { always = yes }

		hidden_effect = {
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {

				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_points_cost_common = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_pick = yes

		}

			}

#growth #leader_trait_cartographer_3 #veteran
oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_growth_leader_trait_cartographer_3_add_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = { NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_cartographer_3 } }
	}
	allow = {
		custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_official_leader_trait_cartographer_3
		oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_resources_cost_veteran = yes
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_points_cost_veteran = yes
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_picks = yes
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_leader_has_required_subclass = { CLASS = official SUBCLASS = subclass_official_economy_councilor }
		}
		
	}
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_show_trait_total_cost_veteran
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { TRAIT_NAME = leader_trait_cartographer }
			add_trait_no_notify = leader_trait_cartographer_3
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_resources_cost_veteran = yes
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_points_cost_veteran = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_pick = yes
			}
		}
	}
}
oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_growth_leader_trait_cartographer_3_remove_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = { has_trait = leader_trait_cartographer_3 }
	}
	allow = { always = yes }
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_remove_official_leader_trait_cartographer_3
		hidden_effect = {
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
				remove_trait = leader_trait_cartographer_3
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_points_cost_veteran = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_pick = yes
			}
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_resources_cost_veteran = yes
		}
	}
}

		custom_tooltip = oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_show_trait_total_cost_veteran

		}

oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_growth_trait_ruler_architectural_sense_3_add_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = { NOT = { has_trait = trait_ruler_architectural_sense_3 } }
	}
	allow = {
		custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_official_trait_ruler_architectural_sense_3
		oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_resources_cost_veteran = yes
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_points_cost_veteran = yes
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_picks = yes
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_leader_has_required_subclass = { CLASS = official SUBCLASS = subclass_official_economy_councilor }
		}
		
	}
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_show_trait_total_cost_veteran
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { TRAIT_NAME = trait_ruler_architectural_sense }
			add_trait_no_notify = trait_ruler_architectural_sense_3
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_resources_cost_veteran = yes
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_points_cost_veteran = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_pick = yes
			}
		}
	}
}
oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_growth_trait_ruler_architectural_sense_3_remove_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = { has_trait = trait_ruler_architectural_sense_3 }
	}
	allow = { always = yes }
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_remove_official_trait_ruler_architectural_sense_3
		hidden_effect = {
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
				remove_trait = trait_ruler_architectural_sense_3
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_points_cost_veteran = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_pick = yes
			}
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_resources_cost_veteran = yes
		}
	}
}


#growth #trait_ruler_investor_3 #veteran
oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_growth_trait_ruler_investor_3_add_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = { NOT = { has_trait = trait_ruler_investor_3 } }
	}
	allow = {
		custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_official_trait_ruler_investor_3
		oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_resources_cost_veteran = yes
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_points_cost_veteran = yes
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_picks = yes
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_leader_has_required_subclass = { CLASS = official SUBCLASS = subclass_official_economy_councilor }
		}
		
	}
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_show_trait_total_cost_veteran
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { TRAIT_NAME = trait_ruler_investor }
			add_trait_no_notify = trait_ruler_investor_3
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_resources_cost_veteran = yes
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_points_cost_veteran = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_pick = yes
			}
		}
	}
}
oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_growth_trait_ruler_investor_3_remove_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = { has_trait = trait_ruler_investor_3 }
	}
	allow = { always = yes }
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_remove_official_trait_ruler_investor_3
		hidden_effect = {
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
				remove_trait = trait_ruler_investor_3
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_points_cost_veteran = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_pick = yes
			}
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_resources_cost_veteran = yes
		}
	}
}


#growth #leader_trait_educator #paragon
oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_growth_leader_trait_educator_add_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = { NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_educator } }
	}
	allow = {
		custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_official_leader_trait_educator
		oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_resources_cost_paragon = yes
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_points_cost_paragon = yes
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_picks = yes
			#oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_leader_has_required_subclass = { CLASS = official SUBCLASS = None }
		}
		
	}
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_show_trait_total_cost_paragon
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { TRAIT_NAME = leader_trait_educator }
			add_trait_no_notify = leader_trait_educator
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_resources_cost_paragon = yes
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_points_cost_paragon = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_pick = yes
			}
		}
	}
}
oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_growth_leader_trait_educator_remove_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = { has_trait = leader_trait_educator }
	}
	allow = { always = yes }
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_remove_official_leader_trait_educator
		hidden_effect = {
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
				remove_trait = leader_trait_educator
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_points_cost_paragon = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_pick = yes
			}
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_resources_cost_paragon = yes
		}
	}
}


#growth #leader_trait_master_bureaucrat #paragon
oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_growth_leader_trait_master_bureaucrat_add_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = { NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_master_bureaucrat } }
	}
	allow = {
		custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_official_leader_trait_master_bureaucrat
		oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_resources_cost_paragon = yes
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_points_cost_paragon = yes
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_picks = yes
			#oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_leader_has_required_subclass = { CLASS = official SUBCLASS = None }
		}
		
	}
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_show_trait_total_cost_paragon
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { TRAIT_NAME = leader_trait_master_bureaucrat }
			add_trait_no_notify = leader_trait_master_bureaucrat
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_resources_cost_paragon = yes
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_points_cost_paragon = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_pick = yes
			}
		}
	}
}
oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_growth_leader_trait_master_bureaucrat_remove_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = { has_trait = leader_trait_master_bureaucrat }
	}
	allow = { always = yes }
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_remove_official_leader_trait_master_bureaucrat
		hidden_effect = {
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
				remove_trait = leader_trait_master_bureaucrat
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_points_cost_paragon = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_pick = yes
			}
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_resources_cost_paragon = yes
		}
	}
}


#growth #leader_trait_peacekeeper #paragon
oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_growth_leader_trait_peacekeeper_add_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = { NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_peacekeeper } }
	}
	allow = {
		custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_official_leader_trait_peacekeeper
		oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_resources_cost_paragon = yes
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_points_cost_paragon = yes
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_picks = yes
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_leader_has_required_subclass = { CLASS = official SUBCLASS = subclass_official_economy_councilor }
		}
		
	}
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_show_trait_total_cost_paragon
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { TRAIT_NAME = leader_trait_peacekeeper }
			add_trait_no_notify = leader_trait_peacekeeper
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_resources_cost_paragon = yes
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_points_cost_paragon = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_pick = yes
			}
		}
	}
}

	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = { has_trait = leader_trait_peacekeeper }
	}
	allow = { always = yes }

				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_points_cost_paragon = yes

	}

#growth #leader_trait_supreme_organizer #paragon
oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_growth_leader_trait_supreme_organizer_add_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = { NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_supreme_organizer } }
	}
	allow = {
		custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_official_leader_trait_supreme_organizer
		oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_resources_cost_paragon = yes
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_points_cost_paragon = yes
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_picks = yes
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_leader_has_required_subclass = { CLASS = official SUBCLASS = subclass_official_economy_councilor }
		}
		
	}
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_show_trait_total_cost_paragon
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { TRAIT_NAME = leader_trait_supreme_organizer }
			add_trait_no_notify = leader_trait_supreme_organizer
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_resources_cost_paragon = yes
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_points_cost_paragon = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_pick = yes
			}
		}
	}
}
oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_growth_leader_trait_supreme_organizer_remove_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = { has_trait = leader_trait_supreme_organizer }
	}
	allow = { always = yes }
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_remove_official_leader_trait_supreme_organizer
		hidden_effect = {
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
				remove_trait = leader_trait_supreme_organizer
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_points_cost_paragon = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_pick = yes
			}
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_resources_cost_paragon = yes
		}
	}
